feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text mapping frontend file paths to short descriptions of their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing lamp state and layout with themed header and footer.
frontend/src/components/LampIllustration: SVG lamp illustration with gradients and animated glow/light effects responsive to on/off state.
frontend/src/components/LampScene.tsx: Layout component combining the lamp illustration and toggle button with state display.
frontend/src/components/LampToggleButton: Accessible toggle button with dynamic styling and icons reflecting lamp state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication state and login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for potential backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes, base styles, and custom lamp glow animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, including features for a colourful animated lamp UI and pending requests.
